explanation: [0-0] In a courtyard, a man in black is squatting, taking a picture of a man in a white short-sleeved shirt and a little girl in a white short-sleeved shirt and blue overalls. The man in white is squatting next to her, making a V-sign with his fingers. Behind them is a white building, and there are some plants nearby.

[0-8] Then the man in black suddenly gets up, puts his phone on the ground, and runs out of the frame. The little girl and the man in white look at the man in black, and the little girl picks up the phone and looks at the screen.

[14-24] Then the picture switches to the phone screen, and several photos flash by quickly. The photos show a boy playing with a toy gun, and the little girl playing in the yard with a man in a pink T-shirt. Then the man in the pink T-shirt disappears, and the picture freezes on the photo of the little girl and the man in the white T-shirt from the beginning of the video. The man is still smiling, but his figure gradually becomes transparent. The scene changes, the little girl looks at the phone screen, and finally the subtitles "LIKE" and emojis of fear and a thumbs up appear on the screen.
